org.osdfreactive.policyparser

Class DefaultPolicyParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osdfreactive.policyparser.AbstractPolicyParser
      • org.osdfreactive.policyparser.DefaultPolicyParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PolicyParserInterface

    @Service
public class DefaultPolicyParser
extends AbstractPolicyParser
implements PolicyParserInterface
    A Default implementation of policy parser for policies inside a region.
